channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Exhaust pipe dumped on pavement, 25th March
item.description:
There is an exhaist pipe on the pavement on All Saints Road, Cheltenham, to the side of Rainbowls Cafe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 25th March
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference around catv cover 700x300x25mm tarmac patch stats required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
